title: Hoppscotch v2024.7.0: JUnit Reports, User management API & more
description: We’re adding AI-powered functionalities to Hoppscotch to enhance your API testing experience. Starting today, you’ll be able to automatically name your requests using AI!

title: Hoppscotch v2024.6.0: Collection Runner on CLI, Team Invite Links, Client Certificates, and more
description: We are excited to announce the release of Hoppscotch v2024.6.0. This release includes a number of new features and improvements that will make your API testing experience even better.

title: Hoppscotch v2024.3.0:  Access Control, Variable Scopes and more
description: The Hoppscotch team has been working tirelessly for the past two months! Our first major release of the year, Hoppscotch v2024.3.0, is designed to provide you with improved and advanced features for testing your APIs and managing your team.

title: Introducing secret variables in Hoppscotch Environments
description: Making it easy for you to manage sensitive information such as tokens, API keys, and passwords. Secrets not only enhance the security of managing your secrets but also prevent accidental sharing with third parties.

title: Hoppscotch Wrapped 2023
description: 2023 has been an exciting and productive year for us here at Hoppscotch. We look back on a year of progress and momentum with dozens of new features, hundreds of fixes and improvements, and thousands of happy customers.

title: Hoppscotch v2023.12.0: Better API testing capabilities and more
description: We're excited to share what we've been working on the past few months with the launch of our latest release, Hoppscotch v2023.12.0.

title: Introducing Hoppscotch Desktop Application
description: The Hoppscotch Desktop app has been a highly requested product by our community. We're excited to announce that the day has finally arrived.

title: Introducing Hoppscotch Enterprise Edition
description: We are thrilled to reveal our Hoppscotch August Release, v2023.8.0 along with the new Hoppscotch Enterprise Edition.
